method: Cook the bow tie pasta according to package instructions.
In a separate pot, melt the butter over medium heat.
Stir in the flour to make a roux.
Gradually whisk in the milk until smooth and thickened.
Add the cheddar and Parmesan cheese, stirring until melted and creamy.
Season with nutmeg, salt, and pepper.
Combine the cooked pasta with the cheese sauce.
Transfer to a baking dish and sprinkle with extra cheese on top.
Bake in a preheated oven at 350°F for 20 minutes, or until bubbly and golden.
Serve as a delicious and comforting meal.
